TopicTitle: Input settings popup contains newline escape

Articles.Content:
Expected behavior: The popup message should not contain string escapes.

Actual behavior: The popup message contains a newline escape ("\n").

https://imgur.com/a/oSMLIDO

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the game

2. Open the settings menu

3. Click on the "Input" tab

4. Click on the keybinds for pitch
cool =) i wonder, how did they manage to do that? custom string class??
